content:
> email page won't open

Please clarify - give more detail. (BTW we had no recent updates that would fix such a thing, if it existed)
creator: wsmwk

content: Further info As you will see from the screenshot, the message content being shown is from an email in 2020! Bizarre!
creator: billhague

content:
Have just explored the new message further. This appears to have a mismash of messages in it, some with a lot of code(?), others with text from a series of emails from a friend, and ending up with what looks like an HTML page from a newspaper (The Australian) summary.

I could just delete it all, but will await instructions or advice from those who know more about these things.

Cheers!
creator: billhague

content:
Hello Norma. Thank you for your donation.

Please do Settings > General > click Config Editor (near the bottom of the list of settings). Paste in app.donation. What value do you see for app.donation.eoy.version.viewed ?
creator: wsmwk

content: Please do a screenshot of your settings for notifications. Also, advise on which OS and Thunderbird version.
creator: davidsk

content: Possibly testing in troubleshooting mode may help, as that disables addons. You indicated it only happens for some mail. If this happens for all your mail, you could open a bug report at bugzilla.mozilla.org. This puzzling, though, as I would expect many to be having the same problem.
creator: davidsk

content: I will see if I can find some pattern or logic for when this happens and also check TS mode.... Thanks!
creator: yogev.w

content: Thunderbird is a volunteer-supported product, provided FREE to everyone, but requires the support of volunteers for the documentation provided. A knowledge base is provided at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/products/thunderbird
creator: davidsk

content: Bu durumda ayarlarınızda bir hata var demektir. Doğru ayarları e-posta hizmeti aldığınız firmadan öğrenebilir ve gerekirse onlardan destek alabilirsiniz.
creator: maxcoder

content: I just did an export and the complete profile was exported - and Local Folders are part of the profile. Look in the Mail folder and you should see Local Folders folder.
creator: davidsk

content:
